scripts.start: apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget ca-certificates fonts-liberation libappindicator3-1 libxkbcommon0 libxss1 libasound2 libnspr4 libnss3 lsb-release xdg-utils && wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && dpkg -i google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && apt-get install -f && node src/index.js
